name: @flopflip/splitio-adapter
description: A adapter around the split.io client for flipflop

scripts.build: cross-env npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:ts-declarations
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f es -i modules/index.ts -o dist/@flopflip-splitio-adapter.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f cjs -i modules/index.ts -o dist/@flopflip-splitio-adapter.cjs.js

author: Tobias Deekens <nerd@tdeekens.name>
